contentList.content: You absorb the shadow of foes who fall under your backstabbing strikes, which gives you <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">temporary hit points</LSTag> based on the health of foe you killed.
Your <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hits</LSTag> saps their target's life to feed your inner shadow, granting you [1].
Night gives you one of two gifts, both shielding you from harm.

You're an innate master of dual-wielding. When you make an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">attack</LSTag> with your off-hand weapon, you can add your <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Ability Modifier</LSTag> to the damage of the attack.
